data.title: Dev Bhoomi Uttarakhand University
data.text:
SOEC focuses on the holistic development of students and aims to provide a platform for aspiring students to be future leaders and lifelong learners. The school focuses on providing accessible modern education in engineering and science. Along with this, it also focuses on advancing knowledge through fundamental and applied research and facilitating life-long learning and economic development. The school has proved to be a high-quality education provider in engineering and provides an enriching scholastic environment. Its central aim is to provide innovative and effective ways of knowledge creation, dissemination, and application to facilitate world-class education and cutting-edge research in the field of engineering, thereby contributing to society nationally and globally.

Collaboration with AutoDesk for “Center of Excellence” in the field of design engineering is a remarkable step towards creating a regular awareness amongst students for competing themselves with the budding engineers all over the world. Meticulous mentorship program helps the students in every sphere of learning and research.

To provide state-of-the-art infrastructure to students in order to impart quality education in Mechanical Engineering.

To develop the students for facing intellectual and ethical career challenges after graduation.

To motivate staff and students for creative thinking, thereby enriching the teaching learning experience and developing the research activity.

We strive for preparing Mechanical Engineering professionals having sound technical knowledge with innovative approach, who are proficient to pursue diverse and flourishing careers in present society.

SoHMT utilizes an advanced, industry-oriented pedagogy to prepare competent and creative individuals. Students refine their skills through interactive visits, guest lectures, and workshops conducted by industry experts. DBUU's commitment to quality extends to SoHMT, making it a premier hotel management university in Uttarakhand that focuses on transforming students into industry-ready professionals. The university boasts an impressive track record of placing graduates in prestigious hospitality establishments.

The school features state-of-the-art kitchens equipped with modern appliances, providing students with the opportunity to acquire diverse and unique cooking techniques that will benefit them throughout their careers. SoHMT offers postgraduate, undergraduate, and diploma programs, including Diploma in Food Production, Food and Beverage, Bakery & Confectionary, Bachelor of Hotel Management, B.Sc. Hotel & Hospitality Management (HHM), BBA - Tourism and Event Management, & Masters of Hotel Management.

The faculty supervises projects with undergraduate students using the latest technologies resulting in the completion of highly applied projects in the areas of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Cloud Computing, Cyber Security, Internet of Things that has accelerated the process of moving cutting-edge university research. Our research-driven Masters and PhD programs provide many opportunities to the students to conduct pioneering research with knowledgeable faculty.

Witnessing the technological transformations in recent years, the curriculum is designed to train the students with the skills that are in high demand by the industry. We put forth best efforts to prepare students as world class computer professionals by providing rigorous personality development and grooming sessions that led to both extrinsic and intrinsic confidence boosting. We equally accentuate on the development of core human values, mental relief and physical comfort of our students. Sturdy placements records in the reputed industries year after year have led to our big alumni network all over the world.

If you are committed, dedicated to your goals, and interested in Computer Science Education I can assure you it is the right place to be.

Best Book for Learning

Data Structures Using C

By Dean CSE Dr. Ritika Mehra

Deeksharambh 2023:

Prof. (Dr.) Ritika Mehra

shares greetings for freshers

The IQAC strives to maintain the highest standards of academic integrity, transparency and accountability at DBUU through robust evaluation mechanisms, stakeholder engagement initiatives and data-informed decision-making processes. Since its inception, the IQAC has become an integral part of the university, working independently to drive continuous improvement.

We value your support and cooperation. Together, we can make the IQAC at DBUU a pioneer in higher education quality in India.

If you are committed, dedicated to your goals, and interested in Computer Science Education I can assure you it is the right place to be.

As the world evolves and the industry with it, we need to continue to evolve our curricula, in order to maintain that delicate balance between education, industry, and students. Students need to be prepared to meet industry demands. At the same time, our industry needs graduates who can lead and drive innovation and growth. The School of Hotel Management & Tourism is set on raising the bar. We aim to redefine hospitality education. Future graduates will have the option to focus on growth areas, such as food and beverage service, Facility planning, Entrepreneurship development with faculty collaboration, hone in on research and innovation.

I embrace this responsibility and will devote all my time and energy to preparing and educating those who will lead us in the future.

At the School of Hotel Management and Tourism (SOHMT), we're passionate about igniting a spark in our students for the exciting world of hospitality and tourism. We believe in going beyond textbooks, offering a dynamic program that keeps pace with the ever-changing industry.

Our faculty isn't just about theory – they're seasoned professionals who bring real-world experience into the classroom. We create a vibrant environment where you can develop not just your skills, but also your creativity, leadership, and that genuine enthusiasm for exceeding expectations.

Whether your dream is to manage a luxury resort or lead a travel agency, SOHMT provides the foundation for a successful and rewarding career in the ever-expanding world of hospitality and tourism.

Just think about diving into groundbreaking research alongside experts in cutting-edge labs. We don't just talk about agriculture; we experience it hands-on, with projects, internships, and industry visits to bring your studies to life. Don't worry about being bookworms – we're committed to nurturing well-rounded individuals who can become future leaders, researchers, entrepreneurs, and changemakers.

Whether you're curious about sustainable farming, groundbreaking research, or building your own agri-business, we have a path for you. So, come join us and cultivate your future, together!

Dev Bhoomi Uttarakhand University recognized the increasing demand for architects and planners and initiated the architecture program to produce highly skilled and creative architects for the new era. We ensure a quality education associated with creativity, innovation and multi tasking capabilities along with the overall personality development of the students.

School of Architecture Planning and Design is not just an institute for learning; rather it’s a place for experimenting new ideas and thoughts. I’m sure that our students will serve the society and humanity in a very innovative and sustainable way. I wish all the students a bright future and everlasting happiness.

The School has advanced well-equipped laboratory facilities. Therefore, the students will have ample opportunities for exposure to do research. They are encouraged to undertake intra- departmental research projects as well as to apply for internships/visits to other research institutes & industries.

All our faculty members have excellent academic credentials and are trained at reputed national institutions/ universities. We are proud to possess a highly qualified staff that is totally dedicated and is always striving to perceive and resolve students' queries so that the overall personality of the student can be groomed in such a manner that they graduate as industry professionals and entrepreneurs.

I welcome you to be a part of our School striving towards excellence in education and research.

I sincerely hope that you will make the best use of this amazing opportunity to study at Dev Bhoomi Uttarakhand University. I am confident that our outstanding faculty will inspire and motivate you to work hard and to engage in rigorous academic work reflecting a sense of passionate commitment to achieve excellence in management education and research. The curriculum is designed and enriched with industry support and participation. The pedagogy is heavily interactive with a particular orientation helping them in developing their competency according to the need of Industry. We empower our students with knowledge, skills, and vision to meet the challenges and opportunities of a rapidly changing world.

We are here committed to provide a world-class education to a diverse and talented body of students. Here students are given exposure to new ideas, international perspectives, and innovative teaching in an encouraging and open academic environment. Most of our students have been placed in top MNCs and many of them are handling key positions. Our Alumni will be armed with the skills they need to succeed in a diverse set of fields, both in India and abroad.

Maj. Gen. (Dr) OP Soni on

'the DBUU Mission to Prepare Global Professionals and Business Leaders

Deeksharambh 2023:

Maj. Gen. (Dr) OP Soni, VSM, ndc

shares greetings for freshers

I sincerely hope that you will make the best use of this amazing opportunity to study at Dev Bhoomi Uttarakhand University. I am confident that our outstanding faculty will inspire and motivate you to work hard and to engage in rigorous academic work reflecting a sense of passionate commitment to achieve excellence in management education and research. The curriculum is designed and enriched with industry support and participation. The pedagogy is heavily interactive with a particular orientation helping them in developing their competency according to the need of Industry. We empower our students with knowledge, skills, and vision to meet the challenges and opportunities of a rapidly changing world.

We are here committed to provide a world-class education to a diverse and talented body of students. Here students are given exposure to new ideas, international perspectives, and innovative teaching in an encouraging and open academic environment. Most of our students have been placed in top MNCs and many of them are handling key positions. Our Alumni will be armed with the skills they need to succeed in a diverse set of fields, both in India and abroad.

Welcome to, School of Pharmacy & Research at Dev Bhoomi Uttarakhand University Accept my heartiest congratulations for selecting the pharmacy profession as your career. Pharmacy service is a health profession that links health sciences with chemical sciences and aims to ensure the safe and effective use of Pharmaceutical Drugs. The discipline of Pharmacy embraces the knowledge on synthesis, chemistry and preparation of drugs. In line with our vision of providing an 'Problem Based Learning' and research environment designed to develop independent, innovative and creative ideas, the department is offering Diploma course of two years duration under-graduate course of four years duration and post-graduation course of two years duration in Pharmaceutics and Pharmacology streams.

I feel honored to inform you that we started – PhD program also. The Department is enriched with dynamic staff that is known for discipline and dedication, sophisticated computerized laboratories and research facilities to prepare the employable youth as per demand of the Pharma industry & health care system. At the end, I would like to thank you all for taking a shuttle round with us. I cordially invite you to visit our official website and pay a personal visit to our campus.

With over 15+ diverse programs spanning undergraduate, postgraduate, and Ph.D. levels, we cater to a wide range of interests. Delve into the intricacies of journalism, advertising, public relations, filmmaking, digital media, and more. Whether you dream of writing captivating articles, crafting impactful films, or influencing public opinion, we have the program to launch your journey. Our experienced faculty, industry professionals, and state-of-the-art facilities provide a stimulating platform for hands-on learning. Dive into practical workshops, engage in collaborative projects, and gain real-world experience through internships with leading media organizations.

Our graduates enter the workforce equipped with critical thinking skills, creative problem-solving abilities, and strong communication foundations. They thrive in diverse fields such as journalism, advertising, public relations, filmmaking, content creation, and beyond.

Join our vibrant community of learners in the best Mass Communication College in Dehradun and explore the path of a transformative journey at the School of Journalism and Liberal Arts. Discover your voice, refine your skills, and make your mark on the ever-evolving world of communication.

The School of Journalism & Liberals Arts is setting the benchmark in media literacy, media research and is committed to building strong media opportunities for new aspirants who are willing to make a career in the media industry. Dev Bhoomi Uttarakhand University is dedicated to creating a dynamic teaching and research atmosphere in the domain of media studies and liberal arts. The school is making its strongest visibility on the map of India as a center of excellence with continuous assessments. In the past few years, we are able to design industry-oriented media literacy for better career prospects of our young media aspirants. We believe in the training of students with industry interface, inviting industry professionals and celebrities across the country.

The school has advanced laboratory facilities equipped with the state-of-the-art equipment required for the project work & experience. Therefore, the students will have ample opportunities for practical and live exposure. The school is dedicated to encouraging various research projects, internships, and visits. All our faculty members have excellent academic credentials and are trained at reputed national/institutes/universities. We are always striving to perceive and resolve students' queries so that the overall personality of the students can be groomed in such a manner that they graduate as industrial professionals. Thank you for your interest in the school of Journalism & Liberal Arts. I welcome you to be a part of our School striving towards excellence in education and research.

Beyond the classroom, you'll gain invaluable experience through hands-on clinical rotations in renowned healthcare institutions. This immersive approach allows you to hone your clinical skills, develop compassion, and build confidence under the guidance of experienced professionals.

Nursing graduates are highly sought-after professionals with diverse career paths. You could work in hospitals, community clinics, public health settings, or even pursue specializations such as critical care, pediatrics, or mental health nursing.

As a graduate of our B.Sc. Nursing and GNM diploma programs, you'll join a distinguished network of alumni who are making a profound impact on lives across the country. You'll be equipped to not only provide exceptional care but also advocate for patients, promote health awareness, and contribute to positive change within the healthcare system.

Welcome to Dev Bhoomi Medical College of Paramedical Sciences! We are honored to have you join our esteemed institution, dedicated to educating compassionate and skilled healthcare professionals.

We believe true education empowers individuals to serve. Our dedicated faculty will guide you beyond textbooks and classrooms, fostering both knowledge and strong moral character. You'll be encouraged to actively learn, pursue your passion, and develop the ethical values needed to excel in the paramedical field and make a positive impact on society.

As you embark on this journey, remember that you join a diverse and supportive community. Embrace inclusivity, forge meaningful connections, and support one another. May your time here be transformative, empowering you to flourish as exceptional healthcare professionals, ready to serve humanity.

Enhancing academics by including the latest technologies to make the students industry-ready. Providing a scholarly and professional environment in the field of engineering. Promote cutting-edge research and innovation for the development of the nation. To create academic-industry linkage for experiential learning and practical exposure.

To become a center of excellence in skill development and groom the Engineering professional to cope up with the changing global scenario through research and innovation.

In addition to the well-prepared curriculum related laboratories, the Department has many state of the art facilities for assisting different projects and development in the embedded system, VLSI, RF Engineering, and wireless technology.

Enhancing academics by including the latest technologies to make the students industry-ready. Providing a scholarly and professional environment in the field of engineering. Promote cutting-edge research and innovation for the development of the nation. To create academic-industry linkage for experiential learning and practical exposure.

To become a center of excellence in skill development and groom the Engineering professional to cope up with the changing global scenario through research and innovation.

The industry-relevant curriculum of btech computer science course provides students with the knowledge of the database, networking, software testing, programming language, operating system, frontend software development, backend software development, network design, network management, database administrator, data analytics, software testing, and maintenance, and system software development, etc.

To give due importance to applied and theoretical aspects of computing, DBUU, one of the best Computer Science colleges in Dehradun makes sure that it also covers most of the foundational features of computing sciences and amplifies the engineering skills among students for problem-solving and innovations using computing sciences.
